::Slag/Repugnus::
Slag looked to JetV as he yelled out. "Shut yer mouth.  I should come 
there and teach lesson." he then turned and blasted a flame at same bot 
he had been shotting for the whole battle.

Repugnus stood dumbfounded as the sword talked to the drunk bot.
"What the hell?" he said looking at the drunk.

OOC: yea you had better change it, jeez.

gunthers8@... wrote:

> ::JetV::
> JetV saw SwitchBlade fall to the ground.  He saw everything in slow
> motion it seemed.  The bot hitting the ground and the debris spearing
> him. "What have i done. I killed him." He floated back to the ground and
> looked to the bot.
> "Why...why did i do it. I didn't know who he was or what he wanted, i
> jsut attacked. I didn't have to, shouldn't have. I...I...didn't act like
> an Autobot.
> NONE OF US ARE." he began screaming."STOP, THIS IS NOT AUTOBOT WAYS. DO
> WE EVEN KNOW WHO THESE PEOPLE ARE. PACIFIX STOP THEM." he then looked to
> the stasis locked Switchblade. He ran and picked him up and began
> running for the ship and it's small CR.
>
